articles.author: atri25
articles.title: Salman Butt, captain in spot-fixing scandal, appointed to Pakistan selection committee - Wisden
articles.description: PCB has named tainted Salman Butt as one of the consultants in the national selection panel, along with Kamran Akmal and Iftikhar Anjum.
articles.content: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has named former captain Salman Butt, infamous for his role in the 2010 spot-fixing scandal, as one of the consultants in the national selection panel, along with for… [+1308 chars]
